segments.text: The sun is up ! Time for all the campers to rise . Time to get paddling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no ! No more paddling ! My arms are sore !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do not worry . Today will be easier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Beth , what date is today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Today is Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the date today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Today is July 4th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , i almost forgot . Today is my mom's birthday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Call her on my cell phone . Wish her “ Happy Birthday ! ” Tell her you are out exploring the great American wilderness . Tell her I said she is lucky to be born on Independence Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks ! I will do that ! When is your birthday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is December 25th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! What a lucky girl ! Your birthday is on Christmas Day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I am lucky . I was born on Christ ’ s birthday . Maybe that is why I usually go to church on Sundays . When is your birthday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: April 2nd . I missed being a target of a lot of jokes by one day . I guess I am lucky , too !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is true ! Here , have some Granola for breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After eating , we will take down our tent . Then we will pack everything into the canoe , We can shove off by 6
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about going for swim around 10
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That should work out great . You are miracle worker ! You have got me awake and motivated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Happy Independence Day !
segments.speaker: S1
